short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for managing local storage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Local Storage is a handy Chrome extension that offers a user-friendly interface to view, manage, and manipulate the items in your browser's local storage. Forget about delving into the Console tab every time you need to check on your local storage. This extension provides all the tools you need at your fingertips.
